name: It's ok to cry
description:
[Game Introduction]
A blue girl is crying in the garden.
Why is she crying?
Noona's story begins.
You can cry when you are sad.

[How to play]
1. Gather hearts with tabs and level up.
2. Create fairies and garden elements.
3. Grow up Noona by level up the garden.
4. Collect pieces of memory and complete the story.

[Game Features]
- 3D garden
- Healing story
- Healing Talk
- Healing Music
